steps.nodeStepDescription: Jump and then press  again while in the air to activate Lift.
A grenade that sticks to any surface, periodically emitting bolts of lightning.
Kills with Storm Fist significantly reduce the cooldown of Fist of Havoc.
After jumping, Fist of Havoc can be aimed at enemies below.
After sprinting for a short time, press  to unleash a devastating melee attack.
You are harder to kill while using Fist of Havoc.
After sprinting for a short time, gain a protective shield.
Kills with Storm Fist or Shoulder Charge immediately trigger health regeneration.
Sprint faster, and sprinting increases the leap distance of Fist of Havoc.
Deliver a shattering blow with your most reliable sidearm: your right fist.
A punishing melee attack that deals bonus damage.
Reduced Storm Fist cooldown. Hits with Storm Fist have a chance to immediately reset its cooldown.
Run faster.
Upgrades Lift to travel to greater heights.
Upgrades Lift to provide a strong initial burst of momentum.
An explosive grenade that disorients the enemies it damages.
A grenade that periodically damages enemies inside its explosion radius.
Fist of Havoc unleashes a wave of devastating energy which travels along the ground.
Fist of Havoc leaves a damage-dealing field in its wake.
Training focused on battle recovery and speed.
Smash the ground and dissolve nearby enemies in a maelstrom of Arc Light.
Upgrades Lift for better directional control while in the air.
Increases the duration of Pulse Grenade, Lightning Grenade, and Aftermath.
Hits with Storm Fist deal area of effect damage around the target.
Training focused on battle recovery and toughness.
Training focused on maximum battle recovery.
Training focused on speed and toughness.
Training focused on raw speed.
Training focused on all attributes.
